translation.en: [newsreader on radio] It looks like the storm has passed.
translation.zh: 看起来暴风雨已经结束了

translation.en: New Yorkers, a season high seven inches of rain last night.
translation.zh:
纽约市民 昨晚的降雨量
达到了本季最高的18公分

translation.en: High winds and flooding in some areas even left some New Yorkers stranded.
translation.zh:
一些地区的强风和洪水
甚至让一些市民陷入困境

translation.en: City crews still working this morning.
translation.zh: 城市工作人员早上还在努力工作

translation.en: They're trying to restore power to several areas in the boroughs.
translation.zh: 他们正在试图恢复电力

translation.en: Good news is, today should be sunny with highs in the low 60s.
translation.zh:
好消息是 今天会是阳光明媚的一天
最高温不到60度

translation.en: Relentless weather these past few weeks.
translation.zh: 过去几周天气一直很恶劣

translation.en: So get out there, enjoy the sun, go to the park, get outside if you can
translation.zh:
所以 走出门去 享受阳光 去公园
可以的话就出去走走
因为好天气不会持续太久
我一直在问“为什么是她”？

translation.en: There's no rhyme or reason to this life.
It's days like today scattered among the rest.
translation.zh: 人这辈子总会有像这样的日子

translation.en: What are you really doing here, Marcus?
translation.zh: 你到底是来干什么的 马科斯？

translation.en: Just checking up on an old friend.
[Helen] "John, I'm sorry I can't be there for you.
translation.zh: “约翰 我很抱歉没能和你在一起

translation.en: But you still need something, someone, to love.
translation.zh: 但你需要去爱某个人或某个东西

translation.en: So start with this. Because the car doesn't count.
translation.zh: 那么就用它来开始吧 因为那部车并不能算

translation.en: I love you, John. This illness has loomed over us for a long time
translation.zh: 我爱你 约翰 疾病已经纠缠我很久了

translation.en: and now that I have found my peace, find yours.
translation.zh: 现在我找到了安宁 还有你的

translation.en: -Until that day, your best friend, Helen." -[sobbing]
translation.zh: 直到那一天 你最好的朋友 海伦”
我起来了 我起来了…
我起来了 我起来了

translation.en: We'll grab you some kibble later.
[man speaking Russian] Do you want anything?
[in Russian] I just smoke a cigarette.
[in Russian] Move your ass, we are late!

translation.zh: 多少钱？ 你说什么？ 你对我说什么？

translation.en: [in Russian] Every bitch has a price.
[man speaking Russian] Who does he think he is?
[in English] You have good day, sir.
[man speaking Russian] Where's the fucking car key?
[man speaking Russian] Shut up that fucking dog!
[man speaking Russian] Did you find the key?
[man speaking Russian] I think I'm gonna keep this mother fucker.
translation.zh: 我想我会留着这个混蛋

translation.en: [man] I want a new VIN number and some clean papers.
translation.zh:
我要一个新的VIN号码
和一些干净证件

translation.en: I asked you where the hell did you get it?
translation.zh: 我问你从哪弄到这车的？
埃尔菲 塔拉索夫干的

translation.en: All right, get out of here. Out of my shop. Get out right now.
translation.zh:
好了 快走吧
离开我的车店 快离开

translation.en: [Iosef] Did you just lose your shit, Aurelio?
translation.zh: 你是不是吓尿了 奥雷里奥？

translation.en: What did you say? What did you say to me?
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 你对我说什么？

translation.en: You don't own me, punk. I work with your father, all right?
translation.zh: 我不是你的小弟 小子 我为你父亲工作 好吧？

translation.en: The owner of that car, did you kill him or what?
translation.zh: 你把那车的主人给杀了？

translation.en: No. I sure as hell fucked up his dog. [laughs]
translation.zh: 没有 我很确定我弄死了他的狗

translation.en: -Fucked up his dog? That's what you did? -Yeah...
translation.zh:
你弄死了他的狗？
这就是你所做的？ -弄死了他的狗？
-是…

translation.en: -Aw, look at you. That's great. -[tense music playing]
translation.zh: 啊 看看你 那太棒了

translation.en: You're gonna come into my shop and you're gonna pull a gun on me.
translation.zh:
你会到我的车店来
然后用枪指着我

translation.en: Now, either you kill me right now
or you get the fuck outta my shop!
[man] Viggo is not gonna like this.
How do you know what Viggo likes or doesn't like?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道维戈喜欢或不喜欢什么？

translation.en: I'll tell you something he's gonna understand.
translation.zh: 我告诉你一些他会理解的事

translation.en: You've got a fucking pair on you, old man!
translation.zh: 你他妈真有种 老不死的！

translation.en: I guess we'll be taking our business someplace else.
translation.zh: 我想我们得换个地方了

translation.en: [Aurelio] So what are you gonna do?
[Viggo] I heard you struck my son.
translation.zh: 我听说你打了我的儿子

translation.en: -[Aurelio] Yes sir, I did. -And may I ask why?
translation.zh:
-是的 我打了
-我能问问为什么吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, because he stole John Wick's car, sir.
translation.zh: 好吧 因为他偷了约翰威克的车 先生

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you gave them much of a choice anyway, though, right?
translation.zh:
我是说 你也没给
他们什么选择的余地 对不对？

translation.en: We won't be hearing from them anytime soon.
translation.zh: 我们短期内不会收到他们的来信

translation.en: -[man] Viggo, English, please. Come on-- -[in English] Stay, God damn it!
translation.zh:
-维戈 说英语 拜托…
-呆在这儿 该死的！

translation.en: [Iosef, with struggled breath] What did I do?
-[Iosef grunts] -[in Russian] You screwed up in full.
[Iosef speaking English] We did what you asked. No one saw shit.
translation.zh:
我们只是做了你要求做的事
没人看到

translation.en: I'm not talking about Atlantic City.
translation.zh: 我不是在说亚特兰大的那件事

translation.en: You mean Aurelio's? So I stole a fucking car!
translation.zh:
你是说奥雷里奥的那件事？
我只是偷了部车！

-好了 我要去…
-你给我呆在这！

translation.en: It's not what you did, son, that angers me so.
translation.zh: 儿子 我不是因为你做了什么 而生气

translation.en: -[Viggo] It's who you did it to. -Who? The fucking nobody?
translation.zh: 而是你对谁做什么了 谁啊？ 无名小卒！

translation.en: [Viggo] He once was an associate of ours.
-The Boogeyman? -Well, John wasn't exactly The Boogeyman.
translation.zh: 夜魔？ 约翰不是那个夜魔

translation.en: He was the one you sent to kill the fucking Boogeyman.
translation.zh: 他是被派去杀夜魔的人

translation.en: [Viggo] John is a man of focus,
Something you know very little about.
I once saw him kill three men in a bar...
translation.zh: 我曾看到他在酒吧杀了三个人…

translation.en: Then suddenly one day, he asked to leave.
translation.zh: 突然有一天他说要离开

translation.en: It's over a woman, of course.
[Viggo] So I made a deal with him.
translation.zh: 所以我和他做了笔交易

translation.en: I gave him an impossible task.
translation.zh: 我给了他一个不可能完成的任务

translation.en: A job no one could have pulled off.
translation.zh: 一个无人能完成的任务

translation.en: The bodies he buried that day...
laid the foundation of what we are now.
a few days after his wife died...
translation.zh: 在他妻子死了的几天后…

translation.en: Father, I can make this right.
translation.zh: 父亲 我可以搞定这件事

translation.en: -How do you plan that? -By finishing what I started.
translation.zh: 你有什么打算？ 结束我挑起的事

translation.en: What the-- Did he hear a fucking word I said?
translation.zh:
到底…
他有听到我说的话吗？

translation.en: [in Russian] Father, I'll fix everything, please!
translation.zh: 父亲 我会解决好一切 拜托
埃尔菲 埃尔菲 听著

translation.en: And you will do nothing, because you can do nothing.
translation.zh: 而你什么都做不了 因为你什么都做不到

translation.en: So get the fuck out of my sight!
I heard about your wife, and I'm sorry. My condolences.
translation.zh: 我听说了你妻子的事了 我很抱歉 节哀顺变

translation.en: It, um, seems to be fate...
or happenstance, or just bad fucking luck
translation.zh: 或是偶然 或只是纯粹运气不好

translation.en: caused our paths to cross once again.
translation.zh: 使我们的道路再次交叉

translation.en: Let us not resort to our baser instincts
translation.zh: 不要被自己不好的天性所驱使

translation.en: and handle this like civilized men, to move on--
translation.zh: 让我们像文明人一样来解决这件事

translation.en: -[sighs] How many? -How many do you have?
translation.zh: 多少人？ 你有多少人？

translation.en: [Viggo singing softly in Russian] ♪ Or the Boogeyman will come for you ♪
♪ Or the Boogeyman will come for you ♪
♪ Or the Boogeyman will come for you ♪
♪ And take the children That don't behave ♪
translation.zh: 带走那些不守规矩的孩子
晚上好 约翰 晚上好 吉米

translation.en: No, just sorting some stuff out.
translation.zh: 没有 只是理清点事情

-晚安 约翰
-晚安 吉米

translation.en: I'd like to make a dinner reservation for 12.
translation.zh: 我想预定个12人份的晚餐
很高兴见到你 约翰
你的气色不错 （特殊废料丢弃）

translation.en: And here I'd feared you'd left all this behind.
translation.zh: 我就怕你早就不干这些了

translation.en: Will I be hearing from you anytime soon?
translation.zh: 我以后还能再接到你电话吗？

translation.en: Put a contract on John Wick.
[Viggo speaking Russian indistinctly] Lure the wolf with the hen.
Put Iosef in the Red Circle and wait.
translation.zh: 把埃尔菲放在… 红圈里 然后我们守株待兔

translation.en: [Marcus] To what do I owe this visit?
translation.zh: 您登门拜访 有何贵干？

translation.en: I have a job for you.
[inhales] I want to offer you this face to face...
seeing as how you might find it personal.
translation.zh: 鉴于你可能觉得这有点私人

translation.en: Would you kill John Wick for two million dollars?
translation.zh: 你会为了两百万杀了约翰威克吗？
这悬赏只面向我一人吗？ 不 面向所有人

translation.en: It's a timely matter, it has to be handled quickly.
translation.zh: 这是即时问题 得马上解决

translation.en: Thank you, Marcus. I know I can trust you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 马科斯 我知道我能信任你
918号房 祝您入住愉快 谢谢
很高心见到你 约翰

translation.en: I have you for two nights?
-Depending on business, it may be more. -Of course, sir.
translation.zh: 看情况 可能会更久 当然 先生

translation.en: So when did the old place get a facelift?
translation.zh: 这里什么时候装修过了？

translation.en: But I assure you, sir, she really hasn't changed much.
translation.zh:
但我向你保证 先生
这里没多大变化
还是同一个主人？ 是的

translation.en: it is a pleasure having you with us again, Mr. Wick.
translation.zh: 很荣幸您再次入住 威克先生

translation.en: weren't you the one tasked to dole out the beatings, not receive them?
translation.zh:
你是不是就是那个
打架从来不输的人？

translation.en: To what do we owe the pleasure?
-[Winston] What about him? -I'd like to talk with him.
translation.zh: 他怎么了？ 我想和他谈谈

translation.en: I'm familiar with the parlance, Jonathan.
translation.zh: 我对你这种说辞很熟悉 乔纳森

translation.en: I want to ask you this.
Have you returned to the fold?
I mean, chewed down to the bone?
translation.zh: 我是说 彻头彻尾的？

translation.en: You dip so much as a pinky back into this pond...
you may well find something reaches out
translation.zh: 你兴许能找到摆脱的方法

translation.en: and drags you back into its depths.
We have a contact there who's willing to take him out for us.
translation.zh: 我们有人愿意帮我们摆平他

translation.en: If they're willing to break the rules of Continental, double the bounty.
translation.zh:
如果他们敢于破坏酒店的规矩
双倍悬赏

translation.en: -[soft jazz music playing] -You know the rules.
No business can be conducted on these premises lest...
translation.zh: 别在我这儿做坏事 以免…

translation.en: -How long has it been? Four years? -Five and change.
translation.zh: 多久了？ 四年？ 五年多吧

translation.en: So tell me, how was life on the other side?
translation.zh: 告诉我 在那边的生活怎么样？
比我应有的生活好多了

translation.en: -Hey, I'm sorry to hear about your-- -Thanks.
translation.zh: 嘿 我很抱歉关于你… 谢谢

translation.en: I've never seen you like this.
translation.zh: 我从来没见过你像这样

translation.en: -I'm retired. -Not if you're drinking here, you're not.
translation.zh: 我退休了 只要你在这喝酒 就代表着你还没

translation.en: [in Russian] What's in the bath house?
[in Russian] The bath house is clean.
[man] Did you see the tits on that girl?
translation.zh: 你看到那个女孩的胸了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Better hope Lita is working tonight.
[Iosef speaking Russian] Hey, my brother, come here with us!
translation.zh: 嘿 我的兄弟 跟我们来

translation.en: [man speaking Russian] I was instructed to guard the boy,
Are you scared of the fucking boogeyman?
translation.zh: 你是不是怕那啥夜魔了？

translation.en: Right fucking now! Go get me a bottle!
-[in Russian] You've lost weight. -[in Russian] Over 20 kilos.
Are you here on business, sir?
translation.zh: 你是有事而来吗 先生？
恐怕是的 弗朗西斯

translation.en: Why don't you take the night off?
-[in Russian] Wick is here. -[in Russian] No trouble.
translation.zh: 威克在这里 没有麻烦

translation.en: -♪ I'll never break your heart ♪ -[in Russian] You called me?
John Wick's there. Go get him!
translation.zh: 约翰威克在那儿！快去抓他！

translation.en: [in Russian] Wick is in the building.
Move! He's here! He's fucking here! He's there! He's coming!
translation.zh:
快！他在这儿！
他就在这儿！他来了！

translation.en: -[Iosef speaking Russian] Where is Victor? -[John] Victor's dead.
translation.zh: 维克多在哪儿？ 维克多死了
晚上好 威克先生 晚上好

translation.en: -How may I be of service? -Is the doctor in?
translation.zh: 能为您效劳吗？ 医生在吗？
是的 先生 全天候 请让他过来

-是的 先生
-你们洗衣服务怎么样？

translation.en: I'm sorry to say that no one's that good.
May I suggest a drink, sir?
translation.zh: 我建议喝一杯 先生

translation.en: [John] So what sort of movement am I looking at?
Well, if you're looking to heal...

translation.zh: 不过 你要是依然还有…

translation.en: Your stitches'll tear and you'll bleed...
translation.zh: 要不然针线会崩开 你又会流血…
但是你还依然可以行动

translation.en: Do you need anything for the pain?

translation.zh: 芭金丝？ 我想我应该让自己进去
我还不知道芭金丝小姐

translation.en: got out of bed for less than three.
translation.zh: 能从床上下来少过三次

translation.en: Viggo's giving me four to break hotel rules.
translation.zh:
维戈给我四倍的价钱
来破坏酒店的规矩

translation.en: for calling you at this hour, but...
translation.zh: 现在给你打电话 但是…

translation.en: we have received a number of grievances from your floor concerning the noise.
translation.zh:
但是我已经收到很多关于
你们楼层传来噪音的抱怨

translation.en: -an uninvited guest. -Have you need then of, say...
translation.zh: 一个不速之客 有什么需要 请讲…

translation.en: [John] Perhaps. I'll have to get back to you.
translation.zh: 也许 我会待会打给你
埃尔菲在哪？ 去你的！
维戈在哪？ 我不会告诉你！

translation.en: Do you really wanna die here, Perkins?
translation.zh: 你想死在这儿吗 芭金丝？

translation.en: [Perkins] There's a church near Cannon Court.
-[John] What about it? -[Perkins] It's a front.
translation.zh: 那里怎么了？ 那是个前哨

translation.en: It's where Viggo keeps his private stash.

translation.zh: 你好 约翰 嘿 哈利

translation.en: -I'll leave you to it, then. -Hey, Harry?
translation.zh: 那我走了 嘿 哈利？

translation.en: You keen on earning a coin? Babysitting the sleeping one?
translation.zh: 你想赚点钱吗？ 看管一个睡觉的人？
抓到放掉？ 抓到放掉

translation.en: [priest] My son, how might I help you?
translation.zh: 孩子 我该怎么帮你？

translation.en: [in Russian] You know who you are attacking?
[in Russian] You think you can make me open it?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能让我打开吗？

translation.en: [John speaking Russian] Have a good day.
what do you think you're going to do with all of that?
translation.zh: 你觉得你要怎么解决这些？
客房服务员会找到你的

translation.en: Treat all your ladies like this?
You are no lady. Trust me.
translation.zh: 你不是女士 相信我

translation.en: How'd you like to earn more than just a gold coin?
translation.zh: 你会如何赚到比一金币更多的钱呢？

translation.en: You've done business on Continental grounds.
translation.zh: 你在大陆酒店干了坏事

translation.en: And management does not take kindly to that sort of behavior.
translation.zh: 管理层是不会轻易放过你的

translation.en: Don't worry. Housekeeping will find you.
translation.zh: 别担心 客房服务员会找到你的

translation.en: Viggo, you know what was in that vault?
translation.zh:
维戈 你知道
地下室里面有什么 对吧？

translation.en: -[in Russian] Cover me! -[man speaking Russian] Move away!

translation.zh: 我会这么说的 约翰

translation.en: They sure as fuck broke the mold with you.
I can say you're still very much the John Wick of old.
People don't change. You know that.
translation.zh: 人不怎么变化 你知道的

translation.en: Do you know what was in that vault?
translation.zh: 你知道在地下室里有什么吗？

translation.en: Artwork, cash, not without its worth, but the leverage I had on this city...
translation.zh:
艺术品 钞票之类的可能没啥价值
但是我在这座城市里的干的坏事…

translation.en: Audio recordings, physical evidence, blackmail, it was fucking priceless!
translation.zh:
音频录音 物证 勒索
这些都是无价的！

translation.en: Yeah. I kind of enjoyed that.
translation.zh: 是的 我挺享受这样

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, I know you did. Yeah.
Then you got married, ah? Settled down.
How did you manage that anyways?
Yeah, while you had your wife, I had my son.
translation.zh: 你有你的妻子 我有我的儿子

translation.en: And believe me, you had a far better deal. You know. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 相信我 你本有个更好的活可做

translation.en: And the way you got out...
lying to yourself that the past held no sway over the future.
translation.zh: 自我欺骗 过去不会影响将来

translation.en: a lot of us are rewarded for our misdeeds...
translation.zh: 我们还是要为恶行做出代价…

translation.en: which is why God took your wife...
translation.zh: 这就是为什么上帝带走了你的妻子

translation.en: infecting everyone who comes close to you.
translation.zh: 感染每一个接近你的人

translation.en: We are cursed, you and I.
translation.zh: 你和我 都被诅咒了

translation.en: It was just a fucking car! Just a fucking dog!

translation.zh: 是 海伦死了后 我失去了一切

translation.en: -Until that dog arrived on my doorstep. -[somber music playing]
translation.zh: 直到那条狗到了我的门前

translation.en: A final gift from my wife.
translation.zh: 来自我妻子最后的礼物

translation.en: In that moment, I received some semblance of hope.
translation.zh: 那一刻 我看到了希望
一个不再独自一人痛苦的机会

translation.en: -Oh, come on... -[John] Stole that from me!
[John] People keep asking if I'm back.
translation.zh: 人们一直在问我是不是重操旧业了

translation.en: And I haven't really had an answer.
But now, yeah, I'm thinking I'm back!
translation.zh: 但是现在 我觉得我回来了！

translation.en: -So you can either hand over your son... -[in Russian] Nonsense.
translation.zh:
-所以你要么交出你的儿子
-无稽之谈

translation.en: or you can die screaming alongside him!
translation.zh: 要么就在他旁边尖叫着死去

translation.en: Cool it, cool it, cool it, cool it, cool it!
I have your word that if I tell you where he is...
translation.zh:
你可以保证我
如果我告诉你他在哪…

translation.en: -you'll let me walk away? -Pull the contract.
translation.zh: 你就可以放过我？ 取消悬赏

translation.en: He's kept in a safe house. Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 他藏在一个安全屋 在布鲁克林

translation.en: -They know you're coming. -Of course. But it won't matter.
translation.zh: 他们知道你会来 当然 但是这已经无关紧要了

translation.en: -[guard 2 speaks Russian] Check in. -[in Russian] I hear you.
[in Russian over radio] All positions stay ready.
[guard speaking Russian] Position two. Check in.
Will you stop playing the fucking video game?
translation.zh: 你能不能别玩这该死的电子游戏了？

translation.en: Will you stop playing that fucking video game?
translation.zh: 你能不能别玩这该死的电子游戏了？

translation.en: [guard] Come on, come on! Get down, get down!

translation.zh: 是我们的荣幸 先生

translation.en: A parting gift. From the management.
[Marcus] How many times do I have to save your ass?

translation.zh: 你看起来糟透了 不 我看起来像是退休了
退休？ 你真相信这个？

translation.en: -You made a new life. -[ship horn blowing]
You'll find your way back to it.
translation.zh: 你会发现还是会回到原来的样子

translation.en: Let's get on with this... whatever the fuck this is.
translation.zh: 开始吧… 不管这是什么

translation.en: I appreciate you granting my son a swift death.
translation.zh: 感谢你能赐我儿子一死

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to reply to that either.
translation.zh: 我也不知道该怎么回复

translation.en: -You pulled the contract. -[Viggo] And while it was open...
translation.zh: 你取消了悬赏？ 只要悬赏还在

translation.en: every opportunity to kill John Wick.
And if you had done your job...
my son would be still alive!
And in so doing, he broke the cardinal rule.
translation.zh: 这样做 他打破了最主要的规则
为什么我一点也不惊讶呢？

translation.en: In for a penny, in for a pound.
[Viggo] So, John, I had no choice.
translation.zh: 所以约翰 我别无选择
我一直很欣赏你 马科斯

translation.en: [Viggo] The last of the old guard.
But unlike the others, you go out on my terms.
translation.zh:
但不像是其他人
你总是按我的规矩做事

translation.en: I go out on my own.
[receptionist] Ms. Perkins, I apologize for calling you at this hour.
translation.zh:
芭金丝小姐
很抱歉在这个时候打电话给你

translation.en: your membership to the Continental has been,
translation.zh: 你在大陆酒店的会员资格
已经被你自己… 取消了

translation.en: [Winston] I know what you're thinking, Jonathan.
translation.zh: 我知道你在想些什么 乔纳森

translation.en: Which is why I'm not the one telling you that a certain helicopter
translation.zh:
所以不是我告诉你
某人在停机坪上的

translation.en: at a certain helipad is being fueled for a certain someone.
-Have you got my cigarettes? -Yeah, I got your cigarettes.
Yeah. Super. Come on, let's go. Faster!
translation.zh:
来吧 我们走
快！直升机就在下面

translation.en: The helicopter's right down there. Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh:
来吧 我们走
快！直升机就在下面 快点！ 我们走吧
该死 我知道他会来的

translation.en: What's fucking wrong with this guy?
Somebody give me a gun. Who's got a gun?
translation.zh: 有人给了他一把枪 谁有枪？

translation.en: -That was a good one. -Who's got a gun?
Viggo, the helicopter's right over there. We have to get over there.
translation.zh:
维戈 直升飞机就在那儿
我们得过去

translation.en: -[gunfire blasting] -Oh, my God, I need a gun.
translation.zh: 天啊 我需要一把枪

translation.en: -[Viggo speaking Russian] Finish him off. -[tires screeching]

translation.zh: 我们是职业的 文明的

translation.en: Do I look civilized to you?
translation.zh: 我看起来像是文明的吗？
